hw2

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw2.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates all the logic for a multi-player game of "Wheel of Fortune". Use the startRound() method to start a new round of the game using a new hidden text. An instance of this class can be used for multiple rounds by calling startRound() to initiate a new round, and the total winnings for all rounds are stored internally in Player objects. Players are indexed starting at zero; when a player loses their turn, the "next" player is the player with the next index. (The index wraps around to zero when the index reaches the number of players, i.e., if there are five players, then player 0 comes after player 4.)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String[] playerNames)
        Constructs a new game instance. The number of players is equal to the length of the given array of player names. Note that no operations are valid until startRound() has been called.
        Parameters:
        playerNames - array of names for the players

    • Method Detail

      • buyVowel

        public int buyVowel(char ch)
        Checks whether the given vowel occurs in the hidden text, updates the displayed text accordingly, and reduces the current player's balance by VOWEL_COST. If the vowel does not occur in the hidden text, it becomes the next player's turn. This method does not check whether the player has enough funds for a vowel.
        Parameters:
        ch - a vowel
        Returns:
        the number of times the given vowel appears in the hidden text

      • getAnswer

        public java.lang.String getAnswer()
        Returns the complete hidden text (with all characters revealed).
        Returns:
        solved form of the secret phrase

      • getDisplay

        public char[] getDisplay()
        Returns an array showing the characters of the hidden text to be displayed. Characters that have not been guessed yet are represented as '*'.
        Returns:
        displayed form of the secret phrase

      • getGameBalance

        public int getGameBalance(int player)

        Returns:
        game balance for the indicated player

      • guessConsonant

        public int guessConsonant(char ch)
        Checks whether the given consonant occurs in the hidden text, updates the displayed text accordingly, and adjusts the current player's balance by the number of occurrences times the wheel value. If the consonant does not occur in the hidden text, it becomes the next player's turn.
        Parameters:
        ch - a consonant
        Returns:
        the number of times the given consonant appears in the hidden text

      • guessPhrase

        public boolean guessPhrase(java.lang.String guess)
        Checks whether the given string matches the hidden text (without regard to case). If the guess matches, the following takes place:
        • the current player's round balance is increased by the number of hidden consonants times the wheel value
        • the displayed text is updated to reveal all characters
        • the losing players' round balances are reduced to zero (the winning player's round balance is retained until the next call to startRound)
        • the winning player's round balance is added to their total balance
        • the round ends
        Otherwise, it becomes the next player's turn.
        Parameters:
        guess - the player's guess
        Returns:
        true if the guess matches the hidden text

      • needsSpin

        public boolean needsSpin()
        Returns whether the current player needs to spin the wheel.
        Returns:
        true if the current player needs to spin the wheel, false otherwise

      • roundOver

        public boolean roundOver()
        Returnds whether the current round is over.
        Returns:
        true if the round is over, false otherwise

      • spinWheel

        public void spinWheel(int degrees)
        Spins the wheel and updates the game state accordingly. BANKRUPT or LOSE_A_TURN cause it to become the next player's turn, and additionally BANKRUPT reduces the current player's round balance to zero. The constant FREE_PLAY, which has value zero, is not treated differently than any other turn. The outcome of the spin is not returned by this method , but is available by calling getSegmentValue() afterward.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to spin

      • startRound

        public void startRound(int whoseTurn,
                       HiddenText secretPhrase)
        Start a new round of the game using the given GameText. All players (including winner of the previous round, if any) start with a round balance of zero.
        Parameters:
        whoseTurn - index of the player to start with
        secretPhrase - the GameText to use for this round

      • whoseTurn

        public int whoseTurn()
        Returns the 0-based index of the player whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        index of the current player
